info.author: Thomas P Jakobsen
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
CSearch is a simple source code search engine. It is intended to help
programmers in a small to medium sized organization maintain an
overview over and reuse parts of the various software projects within
the organization.

It includes

  - a command line tool that scans through a predefined set of
    software projects while building an index of the code

  - a small CherryPy based web interface through which one can search
    for words or regular expressions in the code that has been
    indexed.
info.keywords: source code search,search engine,source code indexer
info.name: csearch
info.summary: A a simple source code search tool.
info.html_description:
CSearch is a simple source code search engine. It is intended to help programmers in a small to medium sized organization maintain an overview over and reuse parts of the various software projects within the organization.

It includes

  • a command line tool that scans through a predefined set of software projects while building an index of the code
  • a small CherryPy based web interface through which one can search for words or regular expressions in the code that has been indexed.
